text: "Man in Black" (or "The Man in Black") is a song written and sung by Johnny Cash. The song was said to be based on Cash himself. It was originally released on his 1971 album of the same name. Cash himself was known as "The Man in Black" for his distinctive style of on-stage costuming. It was one of Cash's famous songs. Category:1971 songs Category:Johnny Cash songs Category:Country songs Category:Songs written by Johnny Cash
title: Man in Black (song)
